title: Endanger A Person
question: Could the public release of information used by this solution endanger the safety of any persons?
description: I.e. The release/disclosure could cause a person(s) physical harm or death

title: Information Classification
question: Do you know the Information Classification and is it Sentitive?
description: Click yes if you answer yes to both, otherwise click No

title: Payments
question: Will this solution accept financial payments in any form?
description: This includes credit cards, bank transfers, direct debits etc

title: MVR/DLR Access
question: Does this solution interact with MVR or DLR?
description: The solution either reads or writes data to/from MVR or DLR

title: Personally Identifiable Information
question: Will this solution store, retrieve or transmit personally identifiable information (PII)?
description: PII includes names, addresses, email address, phone number and DOB

title: Active Director or OKTA
question: Does this solution use an authentication platform that is NOT Active Directory or Okta?
description: This includes any third-party systems we need to integrate with to authenticate users
